phrases: Why did Kyousuke say that?
I will not lead the Little Busters from now on.
From this moment on, Riki,
you are the leader of the Little Busters!
I am the leader?
This has to be another one of his jokes.
He is just screwing with me.
Yahoo!
The Little Busters are the best!
It is time for baseball!
I am so pumped up!
What the heck?
Yo.
Wh-What is with that jacket?
Oh, I made this Little Busters jacket myself.
Huh?!
You made it yourself?!
Even the embroidery?!
Creepy.
You made this logo yourself too?
Yeah.
It took me all night.
What do you think?
I am not sure what to think.
I am honestly feeling really happy right now.
Let us go!
Time for some baseball!
Time for morning practice!
Kengo's turned into an idiot.
What the heck's going on?
A screw must have come loose when he jumped off the roof!
He probably always had the potential to be like this.
I did not think he would go straight to top gear though.
Everyone!
Let us go!
Alright!
We will head over with the Little Busters March I thought up!
One, two, Little Busters!
That is great for muscles too!
Three, four, Little Busters!
One, two, Little Busters!
At long last, Kengo has joined us.
Playing baseball with these members...
Three, four, Little Busters!
It is like we are kids again.
And everyone else is here too.
Game time!
We are winning this!
Wafu!
Tomorrow is our first game!
Episode 26
Episode 26
Episode 26
The Best Friends Ever
The Best Friends Ever
The Best Friends Ever
Alright.
Let us do some final touch-ups before our first game.
What are we going to practice, Riki?
You are in charge, you know.
I am?
I already told you,
I am not the leader anymore.
Are you serious, Kyousuke?
Of course.
I am a third-year.
It is about time I drew the line.
I am thinking of leaving everything to you from here on.
W-Wait, this is way too sudden!
I have been thinking about it for a while now.
Ever since we decided to start playing baseball,
I thought of some day making you the leader.
But I do not think everyone would agree
Riki!
Riki!
Ri-Ri-Ri-Ri-Riki-kun!
Riki-kun!
Riki-kun!
Fan, fan, fan.
Makes sense.
Kyousuke's got job searching to do, anyway.
You are kind of unreliable, but you would make an okay leader!
Congratulations on being the new leader!
Congratulations!
Do not worry too much about it.
Just try giving it a shot.
Who knows, you might even be good at it.
Yeah.
You are undoubtedly much weaker than Kyousuke-san,
but that is also a moe point.
I have no objections as your manager.
Alright, so what should we practice first?
Why do not we do a roll call?
A roll call?
You know, that thing where you call out people's names and they count.
It would raise our morale.
I-I will try it.
Kyousuke!
One!
Komari-san!
Huh?
Kurugaya-san!
What is it?
Saigusa-san!
Hup!
Kud!
Wafu!
Rin!
Cannot you see I am here?
Nishizono-san.
Yes, that would be me.
Masato...
Sorry, Riki!
I wanted to shout my number like I am supposed to,
but I do not know what number I am!
I do not either.
Riki, what about me?
Sorry!
Kengo!
Nine!
It is... perfect.
All's well that ends well.
It would have been better not to do it...
Well, anyway, how about we all do some fielding practice?
Just what I wanted!
First order!
Yay!
Wait right there!
You are not allowed on the field today.
They are doing maintenance on it.
The school said they had already told Naoe-kun about it, seeing how his name was on the request form...
Huh?
It is off...
Looks like your first order immediately ended in failure.
Too bad about that.
Let us do individual training!
Yeah!
Practice swings!
That is right!
How about some snacks?
Snacks?
Wafu!
Do not forget about the batting order and fielding positions for the game, as well as the strategy.
I am looking forward to seeing them.
You look nothing like an actual leader.
I am the leader?
Batting order, fielding positions, strategy...
Where on Earth do I even start?
What should I do?
Hey, Kyousuke
That is right.
No matter what happened, I would always rely on Kyousuke.
It is been forever...
Ever since then...
Back when I had lost my parents and was all alone.
I was diagnosed with narcolepsy and was afraid of falling asleep at any second.
Despite my condition, Kyousuke took me into a world of fun and laughter.
Kyousuke's back protected me.
There was always something fun waiting for me when I followed Kyousuke.
Let us play baseball.
We will call ourselves...
Little Busters!
He gave me courage.
If the world is full of things we never wanted to know,
is our only option to look the other way?
To run away?
You will not solve anything by running away.
Kyousuke!
I was thinking back.
I was always so small and worried.
But when I was with you,
all my worries and sadness would just disappear.
It is no different now.
We are having so much fun because you wanted to play baseball.
I can think of no other leader but you.
I want to keep following you.
You cannot always rely on me.
Riki, you are not as small as you think.
You are simply unaware of the scale of the things that you have done.
But I know.
You have worried for others as much as they did.
You helped them overcome their hardship and saved them.
It was something only you could do.
The Little Busters consist of people that you gathered.
I am not as amazing as you make me out to be.
You cannot follow me forever.
You need to surpass me, Riki.
Become stronger.
Baseball Team
No no no...
Komari-san
moodmaker
it is over if she messes up!
Surpassing Kyousuke...
That never even occurred to me.
Riki...
Hang in there.
S-Saigusa-san?!
Did I scare you?
I was hiding in here.
I figured it would make you smile.
I mean, you seem to be worried about something.
Well, I just do not think I can replace Kyousuke.
I am not the type that can lead a bunch of people.
There is no way I can think of something to make everyone happy.
You know, if you were not around,
I would probably still think the world was full of hate.
I would have been crushed by my own hate.
But because you faced my trouble with everything you had...
Because I watched you make everyone happy...
I can believe now.
That if people think about each other,
the world can be filled with light.
Thanks,
Riki-kun.
Haru-chin will always be rooting for you.
Saigusa-san...
Yo, Mio-chin!
Are you finished with it?
I have collected some data.
Sure Win Databook
I looked into each member of the all-star team
and noted their habits and how to deal with them.
You can use this to think up a strategy against them.
You looked this much into it?
It is only normal for a manager.
But this is way more than normal!
I was always searching for a way to be of use to you.
Ever since I was a child, no one could remember me.
I was just a pebble on the side of the road.
If you had never called out to me,
I would have been alone forever.
I would have wished for everyone to forget about me.
But now, I am living a satisfying life with everyone else.
I am grateful that I was born.
I would never imagined feeling like this before.
You gave me a miracle, Naoe-san.
I only thought about doing for you what Kyousuke had done for me, Nishizono-san.
Kyousuke is the reason I was able to do anything.
You are a great leader, Naoe-san.
Thank you.
Riki-kun,
congratulations on becoming leader.
Here is an invitation to a snack time to celebrate!
At the place closest to the sky!
The place closest to the sky, huh?
Aw, Riki-kun, you are already here!
Kuu-chan and Yui-chan are getting some tea right now.
Come on up!
Have a seat.
It is been a while since I saw the sky from up here.
Yeah.
You know, I will never forget...
This was where you taught me not to run away from sad and painful things.
And that we can keep smiling when we are with everyone.
Komari-san...
Look, here is the picture book you drew for me.
You said that I would have to draw the rest of it.
So, I did.
It is the Little Busters!
When one of them smiles, everyone smiles.
When one is happy, everyone is happy.
Everyone is in a happy, sunny place.
And that place is sunny because of you.
That is right.
It is because you gathered us all together.
Kud...
And you were the one who told me that I should just be myself.
So now it is my turn to say...
You should just be yourself!
I should just be myself?
You have helped us all already, so now it is our turn to support you.
That is the type of kind leader you are.
That is right.
Your kindness is your strength.
You have not realized it yet, boy,
but your kindness drew all of us together.
And that is why we all trust you.
I came up with our batting order and fielding positions.
I have thought up a strategy too.
I want to tell everyone about them.
As the leader of the Little Busters.
I knew you could do it.
Kyousuke, I am still weak right now.
But when I think about others, I feel like I can become stronger.
I want to become even stronger so that I can support everyone.
So that, one day, I can be as good a leader as you were.
Riki, ever since we were kids, we shared our fun and laughter.
We have spent time together that made our hearts dance.
But every story has to come to an end.
No one can stay a kid forever.
Time passes, and people grow up.
There will come a day when we will no longer be together.
I know that you are graduating a year before us.
And that we will all go our separate ways some day, ending all of the fun that we have had.
That is why you told me not to rely on you anymore, right?
Even without me, you will be able to keep going.
I am going to become stronger.
I know I will.
The day will come when we go our separate ways.
But for now, let us play some baseball!
Yeah!
Let us enjoy the fact that the Little Busters are one.
Alright.
Let us start the game.
My balls are not good.
They will hit them.
Is that okay?
Rin, even if they hit them, we have your back.
hitori ga tsurai kara futatsu no te wo tsunaida
It was too hard for one to do, so two of us held hands
hitori ga tsurai kara futatsu no te wo tsunaida
It was too hard for one to do, so two of us held hands

Rin-chan!
Wafu!
futari ja samishii kara wa ni natte te wo tsunaida

futari ja samishii kara wa ni natte te wo tsunaida
But two would be too lonely, so we all came together in a circle and held hands
Throw it!
No fear!
Believe in us, in your friends!
kitto sore ga ikusen no chikara ni mo nari
I am sure that will be strength in itself,
kitto sore ga ikusen no chikara ni mo nari
I am sure that will be strength in itself,
Let us give this everything we have got!
donna yume mo tateru ki ga surunda
Enough to end any dream we have
donna yume mo tateru ki ga surunda
Enough to end any dream we have
Guys, it is not about winning or losing!
Let us give them the best game we can!

Fly high, high into the sky,
takaku tobe takaku sora he
Fly high, high into the sky,

Jump high, and raise your voice high,

itsuka kujiketa sono hi no mukou made

kimi no koe wasurenai namida mo wasurenai

The future, what we call hope, begins now
kore kara hajimaru kibou to iu na no mirai wo

minna de tsukutta wa wa ookiku narisugite

Sometimes I do not even know where you might be
toki ni wa kimi ga doko ni iru no kamo wakaranakunatte

sotto dare ka ga kureta yasashii kotoba ga

kimi no mono da to oshietekuretanda

Swing your arms, cut through the wind,
